title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager fails to create a JAR file and displays the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When pressing the 'Finish' button, the JAR packager fails to create a JAR file and displays the error message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Select the files to include in the JAR package.
3. Click on the 'Finish' button.
